comments.body: Quote from: Dlogd123 on May 04, 2023, 06:26:04 PMTell me the best crypto invest I want to wait 5 year to be millionaireThe first lesson here is not to ask for financial advise because everyone here has different plans and maybe they will shill you the coins that they have right now in their back.The second listen is DYOR (Do Your Own Research), with that you will have total control of which coins you want to invest and maybe along the way will learn something in the crypto world, specially if you wanted to become a millionaire because it's not going to be easy, just saying. comments.author: Adbitco
comments.body: I think your inputs also determine your output, you can't invest trash and expect bunches of harvest.Also I can tell you that no altcoin can make you a million with 5 years and even if there's altcoin then be ready to also invest close to a million dollars in other for you to reap that such amount as well. However it's not guaranteed you must reap such amount after put close to a million dollars because the volatility of cryptocurrency doesn't being controlled by you alone so you might be a millionaire or fall. But if you can exercise patient with bitcoin then and invest with a reasonable amount then you can actually see something good from bitcoin investment. For short term investment I suggest you into altcoin and after you make the required profit you may decide to dump and take off your capital.NB: this is not a financial advise, please don't borrow money to invest in cryptocurrency only invest what you can afford to lose.
